name: Reliquary Tender

skills.name: Warden Staff
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 20% chance of placing a 25% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Damage +5%
Lvl. 7 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 8 Damage +10%
Lvl. 9 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Tender Watch
skills.raw_description:
Removes all debuffs from all allies, then places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on them for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Call to Life
skills.raw_description:
Reviews an ally with 30% HP and fills their Turn Meter by 30%
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: High Elves is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 25 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: High Elves originate from Aravia where they have built a wondrous, shimmering city. Living in these lands of plenty has enabled them to evolve their society to the highest degree of physical, intellectual, and spiritual achievement. High-principled, they welcome exiles and offer them new homes further east.

seo.description: Reliquary Tender is a rare assist champion from the faction High Elves doing void damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
